title: Peripheral software for real-time in-game statistics?
body:
Hey all,

I've a second monitor that goes largely unused while I play league, and am wondering if anyone knows somewhere you can find software that would take in game statistics and display them on a second monitor? 

Simply put, I want to see the tab/O default stats view on a separate screen.

Doable?

replies.body: Probably not doable, due to the fact that it would be an unfair advantage to those who don't have such a thing, and if it is doable, it's probably only doable by something that isn't something that rito would allow

closest you can probably get is this i'd say
http://oce.op.gg/
